channel.title: Would switching to linux
channel.description: I was wondering I am having a few problems since i formatted and installed windows vista. Such as my driver and other wierd shit. I was wondering if switching to Linux would solve any of these problems?

item.title: Would switching to linux
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Unhandled:

Most likely. Which drivers are messed up specifically? Do you have some obscure asian hardware that isn’t compatible with anything?

Lol it is my display driver. If i still get the error (which i shouldnt) then i need to buy a new motherboard for my laptop.

Read full topic
